review_data.title: If you are not Swiss German... Pass your way ;)
review_data.content: Typical Asian place adapted to the poor(est) local taste. I felt the potential, but no... To please the local palate, the food was insipid, tasteless, and frankly speaking below the level of any Asian take-away in any other country where people know what taste means....More

review_data.title: Dreadful
review_data.content: The only thing worse than the service was the food. Will definitely not be back, and would not recommend it to anyone else. Not sure ive experienced worse in Zurich, and i've been here over thirteen years.

review_data.title: Excellent, authentic Chinese
review_data.content: Excellent, authentic Chinese restaurant! The service ladies are very kind and nice. Food comes very fast. Everything tastes exactly like in China. Amazing prices: I mean we are talking about Zurich :) I don’t even think there are this kind of prices anywhere in Zurich...More

review_data.title: delicious chinese food
review_data.content: You can either choose from their daily specials (with a salad or a soup) or from their regular menu: the prices are reasonable and the food is very good. Ask for their loyalty card where the 13th meal is free.

review_data.title: Most authentic Chinese hot pot
review_data.content: This is the place to find the real Chinese hot pot with meat (beef, lamb and pork), seafood, meat balls, vegetable and even noodle. Portions were big and price is good (CHF 35 per person). Will definitely go back again soon.

review_data.title: Different but in a good way
review_data.content: Superb table hot-pot with plenty of vegetables, fish, and meat, (as you select). Basic venue but very good food and plenty of it if you are hungry!

review_data.title: Tastet Chinese

review_data.title: Nice hot pot!

review_data.title: Hot Noodle Soup and more
review_data.content: The place is near the station and even open on some Sundays. The taste was really good for the price in addition to the space inside good for small-medium sets of people. There is also Karaoke if you like.

review_data.title: Really good Asian food

review_data.title: Lunch

review_data.title: pretty close to authentic chinese food

review_data.title: authentic chinese food
